title: HiFly-ChatApp
description: Created a real-time Chat App to deepen expertise in full-stack development, employing modern web technologies.

title: Milestones: A Blockchain-Enabled Tourism Application
description: Developed a blockchain-based tourism app using Web3.js and Solidity. Users create travel milestones and earn crypto credits via Ether donations from business owners. This project enhanced my full-stack development skills

title: PromptHub: A Platform for Creative Prompts
description: PromptHub is a dynamic web application built with Next.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js. It serves as a collaborative platform where users can post and explore creative prompts online.  PromptHub fosters a community-driven environment to spark creativity and innovation.
